title: 하늘을 날아보고 싶다면
content:
?

숙면을 깨면 가만 있고, 다시 숙면을 깨면 가만 있고,

개미처럼 살아가는데, 그게 무슨 꿈인가?

사람의 삶은 꿈과 같은 거짓말, 달과 같은 공사, 기계처럼 무한해,

가장 소중한건 어떤 누군가의 손이 잡히는 것,

파란데 비슷한 여름이 두 번이라도 오지 않는다면,

우리는 언제나 어린애들이고, 우리는 언제나 어린애들이고,

허영심만 더 많일지도 몰라,

누가 말하든, 누가 말하든 우리는 어린애들이고,

어떻게 우린 바보일까,

우리는 언제나 어린애들 우리는 언제나 어린애들

어떻게 우린 바보일까

언제나 어린애들

In the world of children, where all the lights are on

And the sun is shining bright,

We want to fly high in the sky

And dream of a life that’s better than ours

If we could only be children once again

And live in a world where there’s only happiness

And no sorrow or pain

We’d let go of all our fears

And let the wind carry us wherever it may

In the world of children, there are no worries

Or any kind of pain

And love is always in the air

And everyone is always happy

If we could only be children once again

And live in a world where there’s only happiness

And no sorrow or pain

We’d let go of all our fears

And let the wind carry us wherever it may

In the world of children, where all the lights are on

And the sun is shining bright,

We want to fly high in the sky

And dream of a life that’s better than ours

If we could only be children once again

And live in a world where there’s only happiness

And no sorrow or pain

We’d let go of all our fears

And let the wind carry us wherever it may
